bibl.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay, January 5, 1880
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p: No 13. U.S. Consulate Sierra Leone Jan 5th 1880
J. A. Lewis To Dept of State
Receipt of Book "Labor in Europe" also Circular Letter dated Nov. 22 appointing Mr John Hay Ass't Secty of State

U.S. Consulate at
Sierra Leone Jan 5th 1880

Hon John Hay
Ass't Secty of State
Washington D.C.

I have to acknowledge the receipt at this Consulate of a Book Entitled "Labor in Europe" also the receipt of Circular Letter Dated Nov 22 1879 stating that Mr John Hay has been appointed Assistant Secretary of State and entered upon the duties of his office

I am Sir very Respectfully
Your Obt Srvt
Judson A. Lewis
U.S. Consul
